title: Triton's Rosenthal on Navigating Health Insurance Shifts(Audio)
itunes:title: Triton's Rosenthal on Navigating Health Insurance Shifts(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: SMALL BUSINESS IN FOCUS: Steve Rosenthal, President and CEO of human resource and benefits consulting company Triton HR, discusses navigating the changing health insurance landscape, using technology, and the importance of wellness programs.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
